attributes.action: Bring in legislation to make it unlawful for utility, media and telecoms companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring in legislation to make it unlawful for utility, media and telecoms companies to charge additional fees to customers who cannot or choose not to pay by direct debit. Wether this is called a charge, or a discount ot those that do use direct debit, it is nothing less than an additional charge to those that can least afford it, usually the elderly.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
